I have a Pixel 8 Pro phone and want to test the camera

Let me analyze the user's request about the Pixel 8 Pro camera...

Great choice! The Pixel 8 Pro has an excellent camera system.

What are the best settings for night photography?

For night photography with your Pixel 8 Pro, I recommend:

  • Enable Night Sight mode
  • Use a tripod for stability
  • Keep ISO low when possible
